name: Chocolate Cinnamon Ice Cream
description: An incredibly easy chocolate ice cream gets its spice from cinnamon and its creamy texture from banana.
recipeIngredient: 1 medium-sized ripe banana, peeled, and cut into 1/2 inch chunks
1 tablespoon cinnamon, plus more for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chocolate and milk in a double boiler over simmering water. Stir frequently until chocolate is melted.
Take mixture off the heat. Stir in baileys, rum, and cinnamon until well combined. Add banana and blend until smooth.
Pour mixture into a plastic or metal bowl. Cover and freeze for at least four hours. Garnish with cinnamon before serving.
